text: shri lanka malala krida sangamaye di sabhapaki lesa mejar janaral palitha pranandu theri pathwe. 2017 juni juni 10 podu rajya mandalaye maha lekam patrishiya skotland mahathmiya shri lanka agamathi hamu we. 2017 juli juli 03 nawa janadhipathi lekam ostin pranandu, aarakshaka lekam kapila waidyarathna, yudha hamudapathi lesa mahes senanayaka, nagenahira aandukarawaraya lesa hitapu amathi rohitha bogollagama yana mahathun path we.

wari marga ha jala kalamanakarana (2000) adhyapana ha usas adhyapana, (2001-09-25 shri la. ni.pa. ja. wi. pa, pariwasa aanduwa) mudal saha krama sampadana (2004), karmantha saha aayojana prawardhana (2005-07-18 sita) rajya paripalana saha swadesha katayuthu (2005-11-18 janadhipathiwaranayen pasu) wyawasaya sanwardhana ha aayojana prawardhana (2007-01-28 sita) jathyanthara mulya sahayogithawa pilibanda jyeshta amathya, mudal niyojya amathya (2010) in samaharaki.
